title: Mourning Sampler, ca. 1810
medium:
Medium: silk  
Technique: embroidered in satin stitch on plain weave foundation
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Purchased at Mercur sale, cat. #251
creditline: Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers
description: Weeping willows worked in pale colored silks surround a tomb with inscription: Sacred to the memory of the dear departed Malvina Amanda Lamb who died March 30th [?] aged four years and six months

tombstone.epitaph:
